attributes.review: this app is a disgrace. me and my 4 kids michael jerry todd and james hate it!!!!! when i first got it, oh my gosh IT WAS HORRIFYING i saw a small cheeto on my lock screen I MUSTVE BEEN HACK BY THIS DISGRACEFUL APP!!!! i hate it so badly. plus this is so laggy like ur the president broski learn to make better softwares and the right colored shade for u bc oo hunni i was shocked- and it had a white refrigerator OOOHOOOO NOT A WHITE REFRIGERATOR GET UR SHOES ON LETS GO FIND U A HOMEEEEE!! chile anyways... hate this app and i’ve gone blind by just looking at it 10/10 would never reccomend. ever. 🥰🥰🥰😱😱😱😆😆😆🤩🤩🤩🤩😛😛😛😛🥵🥵🥵🥵😳😳😳👾👾👾👾😽😽😽😽😽 no❤️

attributes.review: First of all while I was waiting for it to download it took like 30 minutes to download like I know trump doesn’t have a life but I do and would’ve liked it to take at the highest 5 minutes. Second when I opened the app a bunch of adds popped up for like 10 minutes. Again I have a life 😪. When the adds finally stopped I saw a horrifying picture of a d!ck there might be kids that download that app! They don’t need to see that. I overall hate it DONT download it! 😼
attributes.title: No❤️

attributes.review: it took about 45+ minutes for the app to download and my internet is working fine because i downloaded an app before this , when i opened the app my screen doesn’t work. i press stuff and nothing goes through so i tried deleting it and getting it again in which it never worked. i would like to say it’s a shame i can’t support my president however i don’t appreciate this. Apple this app is the worse app and i’d appreciate if you read. GEN Z WINS WRITE A REVIEW.
attributes.title: worse

attributes.review: See  I downloaded this app and already started off bad it made screaming noises in my sleep like if it was an alarm it caused great damage to my ear having me to go to the ER for days the doctor said that the app itself was programmed to make you eventually go deaf if you had this app more than 24 hrs. After days of being in the er I had to undergo surgery because of the effect of this app. Please I’m letting you know now don not download this, this is trash. I don’t even know the point✨🧚🏾‍♀️🤬
attributes.title: Worst app ever !!! 😡🤬

attributes.review:
This app is absolutely terrible, it took 5 hours to download, all I was trying to do was support our racist, rapist, Orange president to help make America “ Great again “😔. This app started to track my location, watch me through my camera, and even recorded me without permission. I got hacked because I downloaded this terrible app. I even tried contacting the CEO of the app and he was very rude to me, he said that he doesn’t care about anyone that gets harmed because if this app. I really love our president but this app is just so unacceptable 😖

For this terrible app I would like

to get my ears pierced

to get acrylics 

Jewelry

Candles

Soft blanket

Shoes ( 8 or 8 1/2 )

Camera 

A BIG BOX OF TAKIS NOT TURBOS

Starbucks gift cards

Air pod

Clear phone case ( iPhone 8+ )

Mini back backs

Full body mirror 

Avocados/guacamole

Thank you ❤️
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this app made my  phone slow down and glitch. the app is clearly designed very poorly. it is clear that it is made to prey on the unintelligent and manipulate them. it is very harmful to have such an app on the app store. not only that , but the app design is just bad. took forever to download and i have amazing wifi. a disgrace to modern technology and app making capabilities. the app is very slow and does not respond when you try to tap. it crashes constantly and cannot complete the simplest of functions and it is clearly not an issue with my phone since this seems to be a universal experience. it is shameful that apple would allow such a poorly made app onto the app store. i hope no one is foolish enough to support this horrible app
attributes.title: the worst app ever made!!!!!!

attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app, it hacked into my other apps and started glitching them out. Then it jumped off my phone and tore my arms off and I had to go to sleep. When I woke up tho, the app had already caused mass destruction to society and tore down houses and cities and destroyed civilization. Then alien dogs started to invade the earth and started chewing on my phone and tossed it into Lake Michigan and I had to get it back and buy a new phone but the phone guy had been chewed up by dogs too😔rip this app.
attributes.title: Severe problems😔

attributes.review: This is the WORST app ever. It took days to download and when it did IT GLITCHED AND CRASHED MY PHONE! It kept saying, “Trump 2020”? Please get that fixed I can’t bare it anymore! And to ANYONE who is thinking of downloading it, do not I repeat DO NOT even think about it! It will crash your phone by putting an alligator onto the screen for hours. And then it makes monkey noises until you delete it. And deleting it also takes days. If you ask me, you shouldn’t even make an app about a walking Cheeto anyway.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
